# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10000 for the product. This offer takes into account both the value the product holds for you and my desire to maximize the return on this valuable item. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
